message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer for it?
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand that $120 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet in the middle at $150?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $150 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. Can we meet at this price?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. How about we meet at $140?
I'm willing to meet you at $140, but I was thinking more along the lines of $135. Can we meet at this price?
I'm getting close to your price, but I still need to make a profit. How about we meet at $137.50?
I'm willing to meet you at $137.50, but I was thinking more along the lines of $135. I'm trying to stay within my budget. Can we meet at this price?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we won't meet a mutually agreeable price. I'm willing to make one last offer. How about we meet at $138?
